Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for particles triggered via SpEffect.

midstSfxId.Wiki: The SFX ID to use for the particle that is displayed continuously.

midstSeId.Wiki: The sound ID to use for the particle that is displayed continuously.

initSfxId.Wiki: The SFX ID to use for the particle that appears when the effect starts.

initSeId.Wiki: The sound ID to use for the particle that appears when the effect starts.

finishSfxId.Wiki: The SFX ID to use for the particle that appears when the effect ends.

finishSeId.Wiki: The sound ID to use for the particle that appears when the effect ends.

midstDmyId.Wiki: ID of DummyPoly to use for while effect is active FFX

initDmyId.Wiki: ID of DummyPoly to use for when effect is first added FFX

finishDmyId.Wiki: ID of DummyPoly to use for when effect is removed FFX

existEffectForLarge.Wiki: Offsets FFX ID according to target's NpcParam sfxSize.

isInvisibleWeapon.Wiki: Makes right weapon invisible (hidden weapon sorcery)

isSilence.Wiki: Makes effect owner produce no sound (Hush sorcery, Slumbering Dragoncrest Ring)
